name: WANDERHOME NATURE - RANCH
description:
A nature for jay dragon's pastoral rpg, wanderhome, a ranch is a place on the edges of society where one can appreciate the work that is put in to raise bugs, and one can always have a moment of peace and quiet among the rolling fields.

Wanderhome is a copyright of Possum Creek Games Inc. This playbook is an independent production by take my heart!, and is not affiliated with Possum Creek Games Inc. It is published under the Wanderhome Third Party License.
